title: Black Hammer White Lightning
description: Black Hammer. White Lightning. Together, they’re taking on the mob and these guys play for keeps.
quote: Mine fell the hardest.” “Mine are the deadest.
altHero: a Black man (Willie Mays Hays) and white man (Jesse Ventura) stand together smiling big while holding guns
alt1: Hays firing a gun with explosions behind
alt2: a bunch of man on a dock firing guns
alt3: Ventura cheering with his arms raised holding a gun
alt4: a man with a bullet hole in his rear end
